channel.title: The Daily Star – Opinion
channel.description: Latest opinion pieces from The Daily Star

item.title: What the enforced disappearance commission report failed to address
item.description: The Commission of Inquiry on Enforced Disappearances, in its report, substantiated prima facie evidence of torture in 253 cases of enforced disappearances (Eds) and established compelling evidence of gross human rights violations committed by law enforcement agencies (LEAs).

item.title: It is time for Bangladesh to move past the politics of violence
item.description: In a year that was meant to mark a new phase of political stability under the interim government, Bangladesh finds itself revisiting old ghosts.

item.title: How to balance potato farmers’ gains with consumers’ needs
item.description: The record-high production far exceeded the annual domestic demand of around 90 lakh tonnes, creating a substantial surplus and causing potato prices to plummet.
